bio.short: SERGIK is an electronic music producer, DJ, curator, and organizer rooted in underground dance culture and community-driven music movements.
bio.long: SERGIK is an electronic music producer, DJ, curator, and organizer rooted in underground dance culture and community-driven music movements. His sound is groove-forward and minimal-leaning, built for warehouses, after-hours spaces, and environment-aware dance floors. Influenced by hip-hop, funk, Motown, soul, and psychedelic sound-system culture, Sergik delivers immersive sets shaped in real time by space, crowd, and energy—prioritizing tension, flow, and long-form movement over spectacle.

environment_statement: Performances are shaped by environment—from concrete warehouses to desert nights and forest clearings—treating space as an active instrument.
